name: Beast/Monster Claw
description: Claws or talons harvested from a beast or monster creature. Grants a natural slashing weapon for brawling attacks.
properties: Standard: Grants natural claw attack (4 damage, 4 extra, slashing damage, brawling weapon). Champion: Grants natural claw attack (6 damage, 4 extra, slashing damage, brawling weapon). Elite: Grants natural claw attack (6 damage, 5 extra, slashing damage, brawling weapon).
